meanings.definition: The quality of being efficient and prompt in action or performance.
meanings.sent1: Her expeditiousness in completing tasks impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: The expeditiousness of the delivery service saved us a lot of time.
meanings.sent3: His expeditiousness in eating his lunch was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The expeditiousness of the cheetah's movements was awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The expeditiousness of the firefighter's response prevented a disaster.

meanings.definition: The act of accomplishing something quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent1: The team's expeditiousness in finishing the project was commendable.
meanings.sent2: We appreciated the expeditiousness with which they resolved the issue.
meanings.sent3: The expeditiousness of the squirrel gathering nuts was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her expeditiousness in solving puzzles was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The expeditiousness of the bee pollinating flowers was a sight to behold.
